content.raw: We made the change from `yaml.load` to `yaml.safe_load`. This already removed the warnings that came up before. I do not think we actually needed oyaml. No errors show up when I made this change, and this should remove that need for `pip install oyaml`.
content.html: We made the change from yaml.load to yaml.safe_load. This already removed the warnings that came up before. I do not think we actually needed oyaml. No errors show up when I made this change, and this should remove that need for pip install oyaml.
